alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:04PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, east central Aiken and western Orangeburg Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles northeast of Williston, or 15 miles northwest of Denmark, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bamberg, Denmark, Williston, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Springfield, Hilda, Salley, Neeses, Norway, Elko, Cordova, Livingston, Cope, Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve, Bamberg County Airport and Edisto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg
